CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 13, 1957, pg. A10, reads: "Teacher For A Day - It was "Turn-About Day" at McKeesport High School, Friday, and the students exchanged places with their teachers and taught classes the entire day. Shirlee Reeves became the "school marm" in her English class. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Shirlee Reeves, posing as teacher, seated at desk in front of class of teenagers, in McKeesport High School during "Turn About Day," McKeesport
